favourite.article: hallelujah for Jesus Christ as our real friend.O saints what a friend we have,this is what I need for this time. O LORD JESUS fill us with your dear self,save us from our situation right now.O LORD have mercy on us.LORD WE WANT TO LEARN FROM YOU TO PRAISE YOU ALWAYS NO MATTER WHAT KIND OF TRIAL IT IS.LORD we turn our heart to YOU,we PRAISE YOU LORD.
